fullText: Elaine May gives a magnificent performance as Gladys Green, an elderly woman losing her grip on reality, in Kenneth Lonergan's memory play about his own grandmother.
dtliExcerpt: Elaine May gives a magnificent performance as Gladys Green, an elderly woman losing her grip on reality, in Kenneth Lonergan's memory play about his own grandmother.
